nodes.text: The Qeimet fleet was a unit of the Imperial Navy.

The unit was stationed in the Qeimet system of the Juris sector, near the Hook Nebula where the Alliance to Restore the Republic had a strong presence. The fleet's primary objective was to quell the rebellious worlds found near the nebula and bring them under Imperial control.

The fleet's flagship was the Victorious, but it was perhaps most famous as the command in which the Scimitar assault wing acquired its reputation, aboard the Star Destroyer Retribution. They were the spearhead of many of the Qeimet fleet's most notable engagements, such as the Siege of Nulan VI the Assault of the Aturi Cluster, and the Assault of U'Dray.
